verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"When a <S%H120>man<s%> shall have a <S%H7613>rising<s%> in his <S%H1320>body<s%>'s <S%H5785>skin,<s%> or a <S%H5597>scab,<s%> or a bright <S%H934>spot,<s%> and it becomes in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>body<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> or to <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests:<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>body:<s%> and if the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> has <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H1320>body<s%>'s <S%H5785>skin,<s%> it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H2930>him,<s%> and pronounce him unclean.

If the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> is <S%H3836>white<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>body,<s%> and its <S%H4758>appearance<s%> <S%H6013>isn't<s%> deeper than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and its <S%H8181>hair<s%> <S%H2015>hasn't<s%> turned <S%H3836>white,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>isolate<s%> the <S%H5061>infected<s%> person for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> him on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5869>and,<s%> behold, if in his eyes the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H5975>arrested,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>hasn't<s%> spread in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>isolate<s%> him for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> him <S%H8145>again<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and <S%H5061>behold,<s%> if the plague has <S%H3544>faded,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>hasn't<s%> spread in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean.<s%> It is a <S%H4556>scab.<s%> He shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

But if the <S%H4556>scab<s%> <S%H6581>spreads<s%> <S%H6581>on<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he has <S%H7200>shown<s%> himself to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing,<s%> he shall <S%H7200>show<s%> himself to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H8145>again.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H7200>him;<s%> and behold, if the <S%H4556>scab<s%> has spread on the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> It is <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>
"When the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is in a <S%H120>man,<s%> then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H3836>him.<s%> Behold, if there is a white <S%H7613>rising<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and it has <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and there <S%H4241>is<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H7613>rising,<s%>

it is a <S%H3462>chronic<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>body,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> He shall not <S%H5462>isolate<s%> <S%H2931>him,<s%> for he is unclean.

"If the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> breaks <S%H6524>out<s%> all <S%H6524>over<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> all the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H5061>infected<s%> person from his <S%H7218>head<s%> even to his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> as far as it <S%H4758>appears<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H6883>him;<s%> and, behold, if the leprosy has <S%H3680>covered<s%> all his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> he shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> of the <S%H5061>plague.<s%> It has all <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white:<s%> he is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
But <S%H3117>whenever<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7200>appears<s%> in <S%H2930>him,<s%> he shall be unclean.

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> It is <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>
Or if the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> turns <S%H7725>again,<s%> and is <S%H2015>changed<s%> to <S%H3836>white,<s%> then he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H5061>him;<s%> and, behold, if the plague has <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> of the <S%H5061>plague.<s%> He is <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
"When the <S%H1320>body<s%> has a <S%H7822>boil<s%> on <S%H3588>its<s%> <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and it has <S%H7495>healed,<s%>

and in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7822>boil<s%> there is a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H7613>rising,<s%> or a bright <S%H934>spot,<s%> <S%H125>reddish<s%> - <S%H3836>white,<s%> then it shall be <S%H7200>shown<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H4758>it;<s%> and behold, if its appearance is <S%H8217>lower<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and its <S%H8181>hair<s%> has <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> It is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%> It has <S%H6524>broken<s%> out in the <S%H7822>boil.<s%>

But if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>examines<s%> <S%H3836>it,<s%> and behold, there are no white <S%H8181>hairs<s%> in <S%H8217>it,<s%> and it isn't deeper than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but is <S%H3544>dim,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>isolate<s%> him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
If it <S%H6581>spreads<s%> <S%H6581>in<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> It is a <S%H5061>plague.<s%>

But if the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stays<s%> in its <S%H6581>place,<s%> and hasn't spread, it is the <S%H6867>scar<s%> from the <S%H7822>boil;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

"Or when the <S%H1320>body<s%> has a <S%H4348>burn<s%> from <S%H784>fire<s%> on its <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H4241>raw<s%> flesh of the <S%H4348>burn<s%> becomes a <S%H3836>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot,<s%> <S%H125>reddish-white,<s%> or <S%H3836>white,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H8181>it;<s%> and behold, if the hair in the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> has <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and its <S%H4758>appearance<s%> is <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> it is <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%> It has <S%H6524>broken<s%> out in the <S%H4348>burning,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> It is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

But if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>examines<s%> <S%H3836>it,<s%> and behold, there is no white <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the bright <S%H934>spot,<s%> and it <S%H8217>isn't<s%> lower than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but is <S%H3544>faded;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>isolate<s%> him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> him on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> If it has <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>in<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> It is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

If the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stays<s%> in its <S%H6581>place,<s%> and hasn't spread in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but is <S%H3544>faded,<s%> it is the <S%H7613>swelling<s%> from the <S%H4348>burn,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean;<s%> for it is the <S%H6867>scar<s%> from the <S%H4348>burn.<s%>
"When a <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman<s%> has a <S%H5061>plague<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> or on the <S%H2206>beard,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall examine the <S%H5061>plague;<s%> and <S%H7200>behold,<s%> if its <S%H4758>appearance<s%> is <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in it is <S%H6669>yellow<s%> and <S%H1851>thin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> it is an <S%H5424>itch,<s%> it is <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> or of the <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

If the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>examines<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H5424>itching,<s%> and <S%H4758>behold,<s%> its appearance <S%H6013>isn't<s%> deeper than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and there is no <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in <S%H3548>it,<s%> then the priest shall <S%H5462>isolate<s%> him the person <S%H5061>infected<s%> with <S%H5424>itching<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> the <S%H5061>plague;<s%> and <S%H5424>behold,<s%> if the itch <S%H6581>hasn't<s%> spread, and there is no <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in <S%H4758>it,<s%> and the appearance of the <S%H5424>itch<s%> <S%H6013>isn't<s%> deeper than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%>

then he shall be <S%H1548>shaved,<s%> but he shall not <S%H1548>shave<s%> the <S%H5424>itch;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up who has the <S%H5424>itch<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> the <S%H5424>itch;<s%> and <S%H5424>behold,<s%> if the itch <S%H6581>hasn't<s%> spread in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and its <S%H4758>appearance<s%> <S%H6013>isn't<s%> deeper than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean.<s%> He shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
But if the <S%H5424>itch<s%> <S%H6581>spreads<s%> <S%H6581>in<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H2893>cleansing,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H5424>him;<s%> and behold, if the itch has <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall not <S%H1239>look<s%> for the <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair;<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

But if in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> the <S%H5424>itch<s%> is <S%H5975>arrested,<s%> and <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> has <S%H6779>grown<s%> in <S%H5424>it;<s%> the itch is <S%H7495>healed,<s%> he is <S%H2889>clean.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
"When a <S%H376>man<s%> or a <S%H802>woman<s%> has bright <S%H934>spots<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>body,<s%> even <S%H3836>white<s%> bright <S%H934>spots;<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H934>them;<s%> and behold, if the bright spots on the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of their <S%H1320>body<s%> are a <S%H3544>dull<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> it is a harmless <S%H933>rash,<s%> it has <S%H6524>broken<s%> out in the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> he is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
"If a <S%H376>man<s%>'s hair has <S%H4803>fallen<s%> from his <S%H7218>head,<s%> he is <S%H7142>bald.<s%> He is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
If his hair has <S%H4803>fallen<s%> off from the front <S%H6285>part<s%> of his <S%H7218>head,<s%> he is forehead <S%H1371>bald.<s%> He is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

But if there is in the bald <S%H7146>head,<s%> or the bald <S%H1372>forehead,<s%> a <S%H125>reddish<s%> - <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H5061>plague;<s%> it is <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>breaking<s%> out in his bald <S%H7146>head,<s%> or his bald <S%H1372>forehead.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H7613>him;<s%> and, behold, if the rising of the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H125>reddish<s%> - <S%H3836>white<s%> in his bald <S%H7146>head,<s%> or in his bald <S%H1372>forehead,<s%> like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%>

he is a <S%H6879>leprous<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> He is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall surely pronounce <S%H2930>him<s%> <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> His <S%H5061>plague<s%> is on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

"The <S%H6879>leper<s%> in whom the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is shall wear <S%H6533>torn<s%> <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and the hair of his <S%H7218>head<s%> shall hang <S%H6544>loose.<s%> He shall <S%H5844>cover<s%> his upper <S%H8222>lip,<s%> and shall <S%H7121>cry,<s%> <S%H2931><s%> 'Unclean! <S%H2931>Unclean!<s%>'

All the <S%H3117>days<s%> in which the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is in him he shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> He is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%> He shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H910>alone.<s%> <S%H2351>Outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> shall be his <S%H4186>dwelling.<s%>
"The <S%H899>garment<s%> also that the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is <S%H6785>in,<s%> whether it is a woolen <S%H899>garment,<s%> or a <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garment;<s%>
whether it is in <S%H8359>warp,<s%> or <S%H6154>woof;<s%> of <S%H6593>linen,<s%> or of <S%H6785>wool;<s%> whether in a <S%H5785>skin,<s%> or in anything <S%H4399>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skin;<s%>

if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H3422>greenish<s%> or <S%H125>reddish<s%> in the <S%H899>garment,<s%> or in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> or in the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> or in <S%H3627>anything<s%> made of <S%H5785>skin;<s%> it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> and shall be <S%H7200>shown<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> and <S%H5462>isolate<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

He shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> If the <S%H5061>plague<s%> has <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H899>garment,<s%> either in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> or in the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> or in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> whatever <S%H4399>use<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H6213>used<s%> <S%H5061>for,<s%> the plague is a <S%H3992>destructive<s%> <S%H6883>mildew.<s%> It is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

He shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H899>garment,<s%> whether the <S%H8359>warp<s%> or the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> in <S%H6785>wool<s%> or in <S%H6593>linen,<s%> or <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin,<s%> in which the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H3992>is:<s%> for it is a destructive <S%H6883>mildew.<s%> It shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

"If the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>examines<s%> <S%H5061>it,<s%> and behold, the plague <S%H6581>hasn't<s%> spread in the <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin;<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H3526>wash<s%> the thing in which the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H5462>is,<s%> and he shall isolate it <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H310>it,<s%> after the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H3526>washed;<s%> and <S%H5061>behold,<s%> if the plague <S%H2015>hasn't<s%> changed its <S%H5869>color,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>hasn't<s%> spread, it is <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it in the <S%H784>fire.<s%> It is a <S%H6356>mildewed<s%> <S%H7146>spot,<s%> whether the bareness is inside or <S%H1372>outside.<s%>

If the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>looks,<s%> and <S%H5061>behold,<s%> the plague has <S%H3544>faded<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it is <S%H3526>washed,<s%> then he shall <S%H7167>tear<s%> it out of the <S%H899>garment,<s%> or out of the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> or out of the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> or out of the <S%H6154>woof:<s%>

and if it <S%H7200>appears<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> in the <S%H899>garment,<s%> either in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> or in the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> or in <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin,<s%> it is <S%H6524>spreading.<s%> You shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> that in which the plague <S%H5061>is.<s%>

The <S%H899>garment,<s%> either the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> or the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> or whatever <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%> it <S%H3526>is,<s%> which you shall wash, if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> has <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H3526>them,<s%> then it shall be washed the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2891>time,<s%> and it will be clean."

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>mildew<s%> in a <S%H899>garment<s%> of <S%H6785>wool<s%> or <S%H6593>linen,<s%> either in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> or the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> or in <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin,<s%> to pronounce it <S%H2891>clean,<s%> or to pronounce it <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>
